snippet.title: Elixir Emporium - First Trailer
snippet.description:
We're building a cozy open-world RPG that uses AI for NPCs, quests, crafting, and lots more to make a breathing, evolving world. Check out some of the systems we've been working on for it in our first trailer!

Wishlist Elixir Emporium on Steam to get notified when it comes out: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3039840/Elixir_Emporium

Follow our journey here or on our Discord: https://discord.gg/SezT8SFgJv
